nodes.text: The Last Page was a recurring department in the Star Wars Insider magazine, which often allowed for fan development, whether it be polling for what fans wanted, or including artwork. As indicated by the title, the department often appeared on the last page of the issue.

A photo-manipulation artwork detailing Emperor Palpatine's torture of Luke Skywalker from Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi created by Ryan Brookhart for go figure! magazine was utilized for the last page.
Star Wars Insider 42: "The Arrival of the Bounty Hunters."

An artwork detailing the arrival of various bounty hunters (including Boba Fett, Zuckuss, 4-LOM, Bossk, Dengar, and IG-88B) at the Executor created by James Cukr, a sci-fi illustrator from Little Rock, Colorado was utilized for the last page.

A poll asking fans to choose which Star Wars characters they would like to see made into an action figure by Hasbro. The choices are:
Bom Vimdin
· Brainiac
· Dannik Jerriko
· Dice Ibegon
· Djas Puhr
· Elis Helrot
· Ellors Madak & Baniss Keeg
· Feltipern Trevagg
· Garon Nas Tal
· Geezum
· Hem Dazon
· Hermi Odle
· Hrchek Kal Fas
· J'Quille
· Ket Maliss
· Kitik Keed'kak
· M'iiyoom Onith
· Myo
· Sergeant Doallyn
· Solomahal
· Tessek
· Treva Horme & Wiorkettle
· Vigrriev
· Wioslea
